title: On Artin groups admitting retractions to parabolic subgroups
authors: Bruno Aaron Cisneros de la Cruz, Mar\'ia Cumplido, Islam Foniqi
abstract:
We generalize the retractions to standard parabolic subgroups for even Artin
groups to FC-type Artin groups and other more general families. We prove that
these retractions uniquely extend to any parabolic subgroup. We use retractions
to generalize the results of Antol\'in and Foniqi that reduce the problem of
intersection of parabolic subgroups to weaker conditions. As a corollary, we
characterize coherence for the FC case.
